C

Char - Class in entities.characters
This is the class that instantiates everything from the AbstractChar class.
Char() - Constructor for class entities.characters.Char
The base constructor of the Char uses both default parameters to run the constructor requiring both a String and array.
Char(String) - Constructor for class entities.characters.Char
This constructor takes an inputted name String and uses the defaultStats parameter for the other part to run the constructor needing both a String an array.
Char(int[]) - Constructor for class entities.characters.Char
This constructor takes an inputted array of stats and uses the defaultName parameter for the other part to run the constructor needing both a String an array.
Char(String, int[]) - Constructor for class entities.characters.Char
This constructor sets the name to the inputted name, then sets each of the Char's stats to their inputted values using the inputted array.
checkForDeath() - Method in class entities.Entity
This method checks if the entity has a current HP value that is less than or equal to 0, and if it does, it runs the .die() method.
clearEffects() - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
This method clears the AbstractChar's bonuses ArrayList and the durations ArrayList.
Consumable - Interface in items.consumables
This interface starts the Consumable branch of items and contains the statements .getBuffedStat(), .getMod(), .setMod(), .getDuration(), .setDuration(), .apply(), and .remove().
currentHP() - Method in class entities.Entity
Looks for and returns the current HP stat of the entity.
